query: SELECT gl.id, gl.gestorId, g.userId, u.name, l.nome as lojaNome FROM gestor_lojas gl JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id JOIN lojas l ON gl.lojaId = l.id WHERE l.nome LIKE '%Póvoa%' OR l.nome LIKE '%Povoa%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT gl.id, gl.gestorId, g.userId, u.name, l.nome as lojaNome FROM gestor_lojas gl JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id JOIN lojas l ON gl.lojaId = l.id WHERE l.nome LIKE '%Póvoa%' OR l.nome LIKE '%Povoa%';
